id.description: UID (v5) for the Card (atomic) generated by YGOJSON.

konamiId.description: ID on the Yu-Gi-Oh official database. The ID might not appear on the official database for some languages if it was not released yet on that location. Also, cards might not have an ID if nor released at all.

password.description:
Unique 8-digit number printed in the bottom of cards, which is the same in all languages and prints.

Note that certain cards does not have a password.

passwordAlt.description: Unique 8-digit number printed in the bottom of different prints of a card on some special cases. Examples of these are the Dark Magician (Arkana) and the alternative art of Polymerization

yugipediaPageId.description: Page ID on Yugipedia. This ID can be used on the Yugipedia API as the pageId or pageids parameters.

allOf.description:
Identifiers associated to the Card (atomic).

This model is a container of third-party IDs associated with the Card (atomic).
Enum values for the main card types.

property.description:
Special property for the spell or trap (lower-case).

These are the properties represented by the spell/trap icon.

effectText.description:
Effect text for the card (empty for Normal Monsters).

Note that the list of materials and pendulum effects are not included as they are part of their own property.

monsterTypes.description: Array of lower-case values for the monster-type line.

flavorText.description:
Flavor text on a normal monster.

If the monster is an effect monster, this would be empty.

attribute.description:
Attribute of the monster (lower case).

If the monster is an effect monster, this would be empty.

atk.description:
Actual ATK value.

If <tt>0</tt>, it can also be undefined.
In that case, the <tt>atkUndefined</tt> property would be equal to <tt>true</tt>.

atkUndefined.description: Flag indicating an undefined (<tt>?</tt>) ATK value.

def.description:
Actual DEF value.

If <tt>0</tt>, it can also be undefined.
In that case, the <tt>defUndefined</tt> property would be equal to <tt>true</tt>.

defUndefined.description: Flag indicating an undefined (<tt>?</tt>) DEF value.

materials.description: Materials for extra-deck monsters as defined on the card-text.

linkRating.description: Link rating of the link monster.

linkArrows.description: Link arrows of the link monster.

items.description: Enum values for the arrows on link monster.

effectText.description:
Effect text for the card (empty for Normal Monsters).

Note that the list of materials and pendulum effects are not included as they are part of their own property.

flavorText.description:
Flavor text on a normal monster.

If the monster is an effect monster, this would be empty.

materials.description: Materials for extra-deck monsters as defined on the card-text.

es.description:
Describes card text that can be localized.

Only card information that is not an enum is included.

effectText.description:
Effect text for the card (empty for Normal Monsters).

Note that the list of materials and pendulum effects are not included as they are part of their own property.

flavorText.description:
Flavor text on a normal monster.

If the monster is an effect monster, this would be empty.

materials.description: Materials for extra-deck monsters as defined on the card-text.

ja.description:
Describes card text that can be localized.

Only card information that is not an enum is included.

localizedData.description:
Describes translations and locale-specific data for a card.

All translated properties match the name of the original property
and any missing property indicates no translation for it.

description:
Describes the information for a card.

This model contains the properties of the card that will not change from print to print.
